document_data.name: Winter's Cradle Tavern
document_data.inhabitants: Inhabitants of the Winter's Cradle Tavern
document_data.mainbody: The '''Winter's Cradle Tavern''' was a tavern in [[Easthaven]] within the [[Ten-Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Structure: Located in the northeastern part of Easthaven, the wooden building looked ramshackle on the outside. In front of it was a sign that bore the name of the tavern alongside an image of a key.
document_data.Interior: The tavern was a comfortable place with a fireplace burning to keep the cold [[Northwest Faer√ªn|northern]] chill from the bones of any adventurer.
document_data.Inhabitants: The tavern was owned by [[Grisella]] who sold [[Winter Wine]], [[mead]]s, [[frost giant yellow snow melt]]s, [[Grisella's Dale ale]], [[Luskan stout]], [[Cormyr]]ian [[brandy]], and [[Knee-Cracker|knee cracker]] [[cider]]. The tavern was often patronized by the [[dwarf]] [[Hildeth Highhammer]] and the soldier [[Hrothgar]].
document_data.History: In [[Mirtul]], [[1281 DR]], the cellar of the Winter's Cradle had an infestation of [[beetle]]s.
